mapper.select: select substring(add_time,1,10) as day, count(distinct id) as users from `user` group by substring(add_time,1,10)

select substring(add_time,1,10) as day, count(distinct id) as orders, count(distinct user_id) as customers, sum(actual_price) as amount, round(sum(actual_price)/count(distinct user_id),2) as pcr from `order` group by substring(add_time,1,10)
select substring(add_time,1,10) as day, count(distinct order_id) as orders, count(number) as products, sum(number*price) as amount from order_goods group by substring(add_time,1,10)
